extendedInfo.description: Pump your brain with text information such as daily affirmations, goals lists, to-do lists, study material (quizzes, tests, exams, vocabulary, foreign languages, SAT, GRE, SAT, CFA, etc), formulas, speech material, religious verses and more. BrainPump has an easy-to-use interface which allows you to enter text data line by line. Once data is entered, you can step through it manually or pump it at slow, med and fast (subliminal) speeds.Use BrainPump to program your mind subliminally to achieve goals and remember information. BrainPump can be used for affirmations, a cornerstone of many phenomenal high achievement methods created by experts in high achievement such as Tony Robbins, Jim Rohn, Brian Tracy, Zig Ziglar and many more. Einstein said it takes 11 positive inputs to override one negative input. Use BrainPump to override your recurring negative thoughts with new positive ones that you desire. Daily affirmations can be used for many purposes to shape your life: increased confidence, self esteem, weight loss, dieting, exercise, personal excellence, improved study habits, relationship repair, social skills, memorizing wedding vows... the list is limitless.Start using BrainPump today to achieve your goals and get yourself on the path you want to be on.

reviews.title: First of its kind to offer visual subliminal programming in an app.
reviews.comment: Design it better and you\'ll see a lot more stars. If people could understand what visual subliminal messaging could do for them these type of apps would be top of the lists. Make it prettier and more user friendly and put some design into it and you could have a hit here. A mobile app is the perfect platform for people to be able to actually use \'brain pumping\'. And, lastly, please change your logo icon! That thing looks Super ghetto.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Getting closer
reviews.comment: Nice try but it doesn\'t run properly on my motorola droid. The forward and back buttons don\' t work properly and lock up.  Text sizing is ok but need to set it each time rather than having a selectable option. Lastly would be great to add images - a nice to have but not essential.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent concept
reviews.comment: I will try this. I hope it doesnt stop.
reviews.author: Rodel Carlos

reviews.title: The need
reviews.comment: You need to be able to hear these affirmations also.  Subliminal would be my choice.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: If only you could change the font size and color it would be a perfect app!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: There\'s bug spotted
reviews.comment: On my Samsung Galaxy Y, this app cannot be opened fully. It only appears until the green and blue buttons. So I can\'t use the pump button at all. I\'ll give 4 stars if this problem is fixed. :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Brain pump
reviews.comment: You need to make it so you can change the size of the letters and add alpha.  Beta. Theta. And Delta. Music.  Until then only 3 stars.  This is still a great app. I THINK EVERYONE SHOULD HAVE IT.  THANKS.  Also make it to run over other programs then I\'ll give it 5 stars + 5 stars
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: $4.99!!! Really
reviews.comment: Its basically a flashcard app. If the price was lower, I\'d buy card flasher..Re-did my rating, the demo is now 25 so 2 1/2  stars.

reviews.title: Love It! Thanks Dev!
reviews.comment: We\'re subliminally advertised to all day long, why not take over the reigns and direct ourselves with positive, beneficial msgs rather than the \"go buy this\" msgs with which marketers bombard our brains?
